traits.name: Aura of Torment
entries: Any creature hostile to the excruciarch that starts its turn within 20 feet of the excruciarch takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) slashing damage, unless the excruciarch is {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the excruciarch's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The excruciarch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sadism
entries: The excruciarch gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls for each creature it damaged on its previous turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The excruciarch makes two Scourge attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with Storm of Steel (if available).

actions.name: Scourge
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Storm of Steel {@recharge 4}
entries: The excruciarch swings its scourge wildly around itself. All creatures within 15 feet of the excruciarch must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. Targets take 31 (6d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
